content: I think I tend to use WhatsApp more for personal conversations, while Telegram is more for professional or group discussions. As for measuring the success of a conversation, I think it's a combination of both the quality of the discussion and the outcomes achieved. In the case of my Telegram conversation with colleagues, I was impressed with how quickly we were able to resolve some of the issues we were facing, so that was a clear outcome. But I also felt like we had a productive and efficient conversation, which contributed to the overall success of the exchange.
